Package eu.bavenir.ogwapi.commons

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Action
    This class represents an action a local infrastructure can execute.
    CommunicationManager
    This class serves as a connection manager for OGWAPI's communication over P2P network.
    ConnectionDescriptor
    A representation of a connection to network.
    EventChannel
    This class represents an event channel to which other objects can subscribe, unsubscribe, check its status and facilitates the distribution of event message to subscriber by providing the up to date list of subscribed objects to the supervising ConnectionDescriptor.
    Subscription
    This class represents a subscription to a remote publishing object's event channels.
    Task
    A task is a particular instance of an action execution, a job.
